name: Wp-simple-instagram
body:
# wp-simple-instagram Wordpress Simple Instagram Plugins ---------- ####Shortcode : [sig count="5" size="thumbnail" class="ig" heading="Your Heading" disable_styles="true or false"]
Parameter Description
count number of media to show
class add custom class before the gallery
size size of the image, there only 3 available options
thumbnail = 150x150
low_resolution = 320x320
standard_resolution = 640x640
heading Heading of the gallery (not mandatory)
disable_styles Disable built in styles for current shortcode
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
